response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's a game-changer in its field and offers unparalleled benefits. Given its value, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We're offering it to you today at an exclusive price of $9,500, which is a significant discount considering its market value of $10,000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive price. I hope we can discuss this further and find a way to make this transaction beneficial for both of us.", "product_price": 9500}
